key_risks: Dependence on subscription revenue, making the company vulnerable to customer churn and competitive pressures
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party manufacturers, primarily in Asia
Privacy and legal concerns, including lawsuits related to data privacy and biometric privacy laws
controversies: Scrutiny over data privacy and security, particularly regarding cloud-stored video footage
Reports of unauthorized charges linked to Arlo Technologies, raising concerns about customer trust and financial security
environmental_issues: Conflict minerals compliance, though the company is actively working with suppliers to ensure responsible sourcing
social_issues: Privacy concerns and potential invasion of privacy due to cloud-stored video footage
governance_issues: Executive retention agreements tied to revenue targets and gross margins, indicating a focus on financial performance and leadership stability
